sentence: i need to know what airlines have connecting flights between toronto detroit and saint louis
sq2:
SELECT DISTINCT  '"'||v1.airline_code||'"', '"'||v2.airport_code||'"',
 '"'||v3.city_code||'"', '"'||v3.city_name||'"', '"'||v1.to_airport||'"',
 '"'||v6.flight_id||'"', '"'||v6.stop_airport||'"',
 v1.connections, v6.stop_number FROM airline v0,
 flight v1, airport_service v2, city v3, flight_stop v6 
WHERE (((v0.airline_code = ANY v1.airline_code) 
AND (((v1.from_airport = ANY v2.airport_code) 
AND ((v2.city_code = ANY v3.city_code) 
AND (v3.city_name = 'TORONTO'))) AND ((v1.to_airport IN (
SELECT v4.airport_code FROM airport_service v4 
WHERE (v2.city_code IN (
SELECT v5.city_code FROM city v5 
WHERE (v3.city_name = 'DETROIT'))))) 
AND (((v1.flight_id = ANY v6.flight_id) 
AND (v6.stop_airport IN (
SELECT v7.airport_code FROM airport_service v7 
WHERE (v2.city_code IN (
SELECT v8.city_code FROM city v8 
WHERE (v3.city_name = 'ST. LOUIS')))))) AND ((v1.connections >  0) 
AND ( 1 =  1)))))) OR (((v0.airline_code = ANY v1.airline_code) 
AND (((v1.from_airport = ANY v2.airport_code) 
AND ((v2.city_code = ANY v3.city_code) AND (v3.city_name = 'DETROIT'))) 
AND ((v1.to_airport IN (
SELECT v12.airport_code FROM airport_service v12 
WHERE (v2.city_code IN (
SELECT v13.city_code FROM city v13 
WHERE (v3.city_name = 'ST. LOUIS'))))) 
AND (((v1.flight_id = ANY v6.flight_id) AND (v6.stop_airport IN (
SELECT v15.airport_code FROM airport_service v15 
WHERE (v2.city_code IN (
SELECT v16.city_code FROM city v16 
WHERE (v3.city_name = 'TORONTO')))))) AND ((v1.connections >  0) 
AND ( 1 =  1)))))) OR (((v0.airline_code = ANY v1.airline_code) 
AND (((v1.from_airport = ANY v2.airport_code) 
AND ((v2.city_code = ANY v3.city_code) AND (v3.city_name = 'ST. LOUIS'))) 
AND ((v1.to_airport IN (
SELECT v20.airport_code FROM airport_service v20 
WHERE (v2.city_code IN (
SELECT v21.city_code FROM city v21 
WHERE (v3.city_name = 'TORONTO'))))) 
AND (((v1.flight_id = ANY v6.flight_id) AND (v6.stop_airport IN (

WHERE (v2.city_code IN (
SELECT v24.city_code FROM city v24 
WHERE (v3.city_name = 'DETROIT')))))) AND ((v1.connections >  0)

AND (((v1.from_airport = ANY v2.airport_code) AND ((v2.city_code = ANY v3.city_code) 
AND (v3.city_name = 'DETROIT'))) 
AND ((v1.to_airport IN (
SELECT v28.airport_code FROM airport_service v28 
WHERE (v2.city_code IN (
SELECT v29.city_code FROM city v29 
WHERE (v3.city_name = 'TORONTO'))))) AND (((v1.flight_id = ANY v6.flight_id) 
AND (v6.stop_airport IN (
SELECT v31.airport_code FROM airport_service v31 
WHERE (v2.city_code IN (
SELECT v32.city_code FROM city v32 
WHERE (v3.city_name = 'ST. LOUIS')))))) 
AND ((v1.connections >  0) AND ( 1 =  1)))))) OR (((v0.airline_code = ANY v1.airline_code)
